title: Vaccine Information
description: Aspect believes that the best way for us to protect ourselves and those around us from COVID-19 is to get vaccinated.
cleaned_text: Aspect believes that the best way for us to protect ourselves and those around us from COVID-19 is to get vaccinated. Below is some helpful information about the COVID-19 Vaccine roll out in Australia, including how to check your eligibility, find the closest vaccination centre to you and general information about the current vaccines available in Australia and how they work. Please consult with your GP or call the vaccine hotline if you require additional information or wish to discuss your individual situation. Getting a Vaccine [COVID-19 Vaccine rollout for the Disability Sector (nds.org.au)](https://www.nds.org.au/item/covid-19-vaccine-rollout-for-the-disability-sector) [COVID-19 vaccines - FAQs (australia.gov.au)](https://www.australia.gov.au/covid19vaccines) [Get ready for your COVID-19 vaccinations - Services Australia](https://www.servicesaustralia.gov.au/individuals/news/get-ready-your-covid-19-vaccinations) [COVID-19 vaccination - Patient resources |
